statusDescription.requested: Your consultation request is pending hospital review
statusDescription.needs_change: The hospital has proposed alternative times
statusDescription.rescheduled: Your updated request is pending review
statusDescription.no_show: You did not attend the scheduled consultation

hospitalProposalModal.title: Hospital's Alternative Time Proposal
hospitalProposalModal.description: The hospital cannot accommodate your requested times and has proposed the following alternatives. Please select one:
hospitalProposalModal.acceptConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to accept this time slot? The hospital will confirm your consultation at this time.
hospitalProposalModal.rejectConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reject all proposed times? Your reservation will return to requested status.
hospitalProposalModal.successAccepted: Time slot accepted successfully. The hospital will confirm your consultation shortly.
hospitalProposalModal.successRejected: Proposal rejected. Your reservation has returned to requested status.

cancellationModal.title: Cancel Consultation
cancellationModal.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this consultation? This action cannot be undone.
cancellationModal.reasonPlaceholder: Please let us know why you're cancelling...
cancellationModal.warningApproved: This consultation has been approved. Cancelling may affect your future bookings.

reservationList.title: Video Consultation Reservations
reservationList.bookHint: Book a video consultation from the hospital detail page
reservationList.needsChangeAlert: The hospital has proposed alternative times. Please respond.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorizedError: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.invalidStatus: Cannot perform this action in the current status.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
